content:
IRouteHandler Interface

Definition

Defines the contract that a class must implement in order to process a request for a matching route pattern.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TypeForwardedFrom("System.Web.Routing, Version=3.5.0.0, Culture=Neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35")]
public interface IRouteHandler
Attributes
TypeForwardedFromAttribute

Methods

GetHttpHandler(RequestContext)

Provides the object that processes the request.

public System.Web.IHttpHandler GetHttpHandler (System.Web.Routing.RequestContext requestContext);
Parameters
requestContext
RequestContext

An object that encapsulates information about the request.

Returns
IHttpHandler

An object that processes the request.

Attributes
TypeForwardedFromAttribute
